# [[examination]] [[hall]] {{qualifier|as used in the civil service examination system of Imperial China}}

====Usage notes====
{{zh-l|貢院|tr=gòngyuàn}} can refer to both the examination venue for {{zh-l|鄉試}}, the ''triennial provincial imperial exam'', or {{zh-l|會試}}, the ''metropolitan examination''.
